scripts.preinstall: npm link mocha should browserify uglify-js
scripts.build:dev: browserify -t [ babelify --loose all ] bbone.js -d -s bbone -o dist/bbone.js
scripts.build:prod: browserify -t [ babelify --loose all ] bbone.js -s bbone | uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/bbone.min.js
scripts.build:bbone: browserify -t [ babelify --loose all ] bbone.js -s bbone | uglifyjs -o dist/bbone.js -b indent-level=2
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run test
